childElements.name: AffidavitDisclosure
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12, "label" : "Read the following statement carefully and affirm to the statement below:", "text" : "
\n

I certify under penalty of perjury that all information contained in my application, including all supporting documents, is true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. I understand that any false statements, misrepresentations or failures to disclose (omissions) made in this application may be grounds for denial of certification, subsequent suspension or revocation of certification or other disciplinary action deemed appropriate by the Board.

\n
", "required" : true, "readOnly" : false, "checkLabel" : "By checking this box I agree to the following", "show" : null, "conditionType" : "Hide if False", "accessibleInFutureSteps" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "hide" : false, "textKey" : "" }

childElements.name: DocBlock1
LineBreak4
LineBreak5
LineBreak6
TextBlock1
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12, "label" : "TextBlock1", "text" : "
\n

As part of your renewal application, you are required to submit a continuing education form, along with supporting documentation, listing the continuing education courses you completed during the renewal period. Please note that proof of attendance is required (documentation indicating you registered for a course is not acceptable proof of attendance). The Continuing Education Submission Form is located on the Resource Center page of this website, by selecting the link for the specific certification/licensing program. Continuing education documentation may be subject to audit by the Certification and Licensing Division.

\n

Please refer to the Arizona Code of Judicial Administration (ACJA) §§ 7-201 and 7-206 for the specific hour requirement for your certification.

\n
", "show" : null, "dataJSON" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }

childElements.name: AuthReleaseDisclosure
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12, "label" : "Read the following statement carefully and affirm to the statement below:", "text" : "
\n

Having submitted an application, I consent to having an investigation made of my professional reputation and fitness for professional licensure or certification. I agree to provide any further information that may be required regarding my past or current record.

\n

I authorize and request every person, firm, company, corporation, governmental agency, court, association, or institution having control of any documents, records, and other information including documents, records, charges or complaints filed against me, formal or informal, pending or closed, or any other pertinent data, to permit the Certification and Licensing Division, or any of its agents or representatives to inspect and make copies of such documents, records, and other information.

\n

I release, discharge, and exonerate the Certification and Licensing Division, the Arizona Supreme Court’s regulatory boards and committees, all agents and representatives, the State of Arizona, and any person furnishing information pursuant to this Authorization and Release from all liability which may arise from the investigation made by the Certification and Licensing Division, all agents and representatives.

\n

I understand omission or misrepresentation of any fact required to be disclosed in this application or any accompanying statement is grounds for denial of renewal of a license or certificate and for disciplinary action, including revocation of a license or certificate.

\n

I acknowledge that I have read this form and that all statements are true and complete to the best of my knowledge and belief and that my authorization and release are freely given.

\n

I have read and reviewed Arizona Code of Judicial Administration (ACJA) § 7-201 and the section governing my profession, as adopted by the Arizona Supreme Court, and I agree to abide by the ACJA.

\n

I understand a renewal application filed after the licensure or certification period expires is subject to an additional fee and that fees are NON-REFUNDABLE.

\n
", "required" : true, "readOnly" : false, "checkLabel" : "By checking this box, I affirm that the above statements are true and correct.", "show" : null, "conditionType" : "Hide if False", "accessibleInFutureSteps" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "hide" : false, "textKey" : "" }

childElements.name: ApplicationInstructions
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12, "label" : "TextBlock1", "text" : "

ARIZONA SUPREME COURT

Renewal Instructions – Certified Reporter Individual

Please read all the following instructions carefully before proceeding. There are supporting documents listed below which must accompany the online submission. It is recommended that these documents are prepared and assembled prior to beginning the on online application process. To obtain additional assistance, contact the Certification and Licensing Division at CourtRep@courts.az.gov or visit the Arizona Judicial Department website at https://www.azcourts.gov/cld/Certified-Reporters-Program.

  1. Fees: Please refer to ACJA § 7-206(K) to reference the applicable NON-REFUNDABLE fee(s) which are required to submit this application.
  2. Background Information: If “Yes” is indicated for any question in the Background Section of this application, a SIGNED statement must be uploaded with this application describing in detail all incidents including
    1. names of all parties involved,
    2. dates and locations,
    3. the names and localities of any courts and/or administrative agencies involved,
    4. the disposition of each matter,
    5. whether the conviction, plea or finding was for a felony, misdemeanor, or open-ended charge.
  3. Continuing Education: Pursuant to ACJA § 7-206(L)(9)(d), applicant is required to provide proof of continuing education. Complete and upload the Continuing Education Audit Submission form along with proof of attendance. Registration forms indicating you have signed up for continuing education activities are NOT acceptable documentation. Please refer to the certified reporter program link on the Resource Center page of the Certification and Licensing Portal to access the form.
  4. Carefully review your application to ensure all responses are truthful and complete, and that all required supporting documentation is included. Incomplete or inaccurate applications, including those with omissions, may be denied by the Board or result in disciplinary action.
  5. Certified Reporter application fees are $700 for a two-year period if paid between January 1–31, Even Year. An additional $100 late fee applies if payment is made between February 1–28, Odd Year. You may also choose to pay in two installments: $350 if paid between January 1–31 of Even Year and Odd Year, or $450 (includes $100 late fee) if paid between February 1–28 of Even Year and Odd Year.
 
", "show" : null, "dataJSON" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }

childElements.propertySetConfig: { "controlWidth" : 12, "label" : "How would you like to do the payment?", "required" : true, "repeat" : false, "repeatClone" : false, "repeatLimit" : null, "readOnly" : false, "horizontalMode" : false, "defaultValue" : null, "help" : false, "helpText" : "", "options" : [ { "name" : "Standard", "developerName" : null, "value" : "Option 1: Pay in Full (Biennial Payment)", "autoAdv" : null }, { "name" : "Partial", "developerName" : null, "value" : "Option 2: Split Payment (Annual Payment)", "autoAdv" : null } ], "optionSource" : { "type" : "", "source" : "" }, "controllingField" : { "element" : "", "type" : "", "source" : "" }, "show" : null, "conditionType" : "Hide if False", "accessibleInFutureSteps" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "hide" : false, "optionWidth" : 100, "optionHeight" : 100, "imageCountInRow" : 3, "enableCaption" : true, "disOnTplt" : false }

childElements.name: TextBlock2
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12, "label" : "TextBlock2", "text" : "
\n

As outlined in ACJA § 7-206(K)(3), certified reporters have two options for paying their biennial renewal fees:

\n
", "show" : null, "dataJSON" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }

childElements.name: TextBlock3
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12, "label" : "TextBlock2", "text" : "

Option 1: Pay in Full (Biennial Payment)

  • When to Pay: Between January 1 and January 31 of each even-numbered year.
  • Amount: $700.00 (biennial renewal fee).
  • Late Payment:
    • Payments made between February 1 and February 28 will incur a late renewal fee of $100.00.
    • Total due if late: $800.00.

Option 2: Split Payment (Annual Payment)

  • When to Pay:
    • First half due January 1–31 each year.
    • Second half due the following year in the same window.
  • Amount: $350.00 per year..
  • Late Payment:
    • Payments made between February 1 and February 28 will incur a late renewal fee of $100.00.
    • Total due if late: $450.00.
", "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "dataJSON" : false, "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false, "show" : { "group" : { "operator" : "AND", "rules" : [ { "data" : null, "condition" : "<>", "field" : "CRRenewalApplicantInfo:RenewalLicenseStatus" }, { "field" : "CRRenewalApplicantInfo:RenewalLicenseStatus", "condition" : "=", "data" : "Active - Renewal Pending" } ] } } }

childElements.name: TextBlock4
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12, "show" : { "group" : { "operator" : "AND", "rules" : [ { "condition" : "<>", "field" : "CRRenewalApplicantInfo:RenewalLicenseStatus" }, { "field" : "CRRenewalApplicantInfo:RenewalLicenseStatus", "condition" : "=", "data" : "Inactive" } ] } }, "label" : "TextBlock2", "text" : "

Option 1: Pay in Full (Biennial Payment)

  • When to Pay: Between January 1 and January 31 of each even-numbered year.
  • Amount: $100.00 (biennial renewal fee).
  • Late Payment:
    • Payments made between February 1 and February 28 will incur a late renewal fee of $100.00.
    • Total due if late: $200.00.

Option 2: Split Payment (Annual Payment)

  • When to Pay:
    • First half due January 1–31 each year.
    • Second half due the following year in the same window.
  • Amount: $50.00 per year..
  • Late Payment:
    • Payments made between February 1 and February 28 will incur a late renewal fee of $100.00.
    • Total due if late: $150.00.
", "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "dataJSON" : false, "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }
